titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: <*> "dep ref" = "Seine"? <*> April 4 = can't decipher note <*> April 28 = "Ruiken"? s2: <*> May 29 = can't read note before "thought" <*> note at bottom in French, might be inaccurately transcribed

body.ab:
1941 LAFOY D rue Denise 26, de Bassano XVI
1m 1 vols. 20 , Dep ref. <*> 2450
Jan 7 Religio Medici Jan. 13 13 Sir T. Browne (Gosse) Jan. 20 17 Thomson's Poetical Works (Ward Loc) Jun 29 (0.50) o.p.ed.) Jan 29 Samuel Taylor Coleridge, Fausset Feb 5 Feb 5 Coleridge (Morley) Feb 24 24 Prefaces to Shakespeare 2nd series March 7 24 Merchant of Venice (Penguin) Feb 28 March 7 subsc due since Feb 7 Renewed February 7. May 7 1941 S 50 (pd March 7) March 7 Rosalynde, Lady Baldwin ed. Mar 11 11 Elizabethan Literature (Saintsbury) March 12 March 12 short Life of Shakespeare, Chambers Mar 25 25 Shakespeare (Swinburne) March 26 26 Coleridge, Fausset April 4 April 4 Coleridge, Traill <*> April 24 4 Addison, (Warne ed) - 24 April 24 Tennyson (Stop Brooke) 28 28 Tennyson <*> Browning. - 30 28 Tennyson's poems. Eliot preface April 29 no extra charge 30 Kipling, Writers of the Day May 14 Renewed May 7 1 m 1/2 to June 14 1941 S 25v May 14 Something of Myself May 26 26 Son of Mother India Answers May 28
May 28 Study of the Modern Novel May 29 28 Scrutinies May 29 29 S.T. Coleridge (<*> thought) June 1 June 11 Coleridge Imagination, Richards June 13 June 13 Coleridge, Traill June 25 " " (will renew subsc for one week to June 21st 5v when returns book) ren. Nov. 5 - Feb. 5. 1942. 3m 1v. S. 50 Dep 50
Nov. 5 Rosalynde Nov 11 Nov 11 Tennyson, Fausset Nov 24 Nov 20 Metaphysical Lyrics & Poems Nov. 24 Nov. 24 Rosalynde Nov. 26 Did she bring it back? Nov 24th ret Tennyson. must still have it Nov 26 Garden Party Dec. 7 Dec. 7 Enbury Heath Dec. 5 Dec. 5 Sparkenbroke Dec 8 Dec 8 House of Exile Dec 23 Ch rembourse 16 jaun + 15+ sur ab+
